DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare dexmedetomidine ketofol find suitable alternative moderate sedation out-patient diagnostic trans-esophageal echocardiography .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Effects Dexmedetomidine Ketofol Sedation Patients Undergoing Trans-esophageal Echocardiography
DOC.detailed_description: Sample size estimate base previous study sedation equally invasive procedure 2 group difference time achieve Ramsay sedation scale 0.8min . ( In group dexmedetomidine 12.4 & group ketofol 13.2 S.D 0.8 ) . The sample size come 22 subject per group power 90 % & confidence interval 95 % . For possible dropout , decide include 10 % extra subject finally decide include 25 subject per group . ( Total sample size 50 subject ) Normality quantitative data check measure Kolmogorov Smirnov test normality . If data normally distribute Student t-test apply comparison 2 group . Mann-Whitney U-test use statistical analysis skew continuous variable order categorical data . Proportions compare use Chi square Fisher 's exact test whichever applicable . Wilcoxon Signed rank test use skew data score ( time relate variable ) . . For comparison ( time relate variable ) Hemodynamics Repeated Measure ANOVA apply . All statistical test two-sided performed significance level Î±=0.05 . Analysis conduct use SPSS Windows
DOC.criteria: Patients Atrial septal defect/Valvular Heart disease ( MS/MR/AS/AR ) Atrial fibrillation fast ventricular rate Congestive cardiac failure BMI > 30 Perforated viscus/active GI bleed Esophageal stricture/tumor/laceration H/o radiation neck & mediastinum H/o GI surgery H/o dysphagia Restriction neck mobility Active esophagitis/peptic ulcer disease Symptomatic bradycardia Seizure disorder Coagulopathy/thrombocytopenia
